thread.title: How was CCTV footage on Jong-nam leaked, asks Amanah leader
thread.title_full: How was CCTV footage on Jong-nam leaked, asks Amanah leader

title: How was CCTV footage on Jong-nam leaked, asks Amanah leader
text:
More 
Parti Amanah Negara (Amanah) deputy president Salahuddin Ayub wants to know how CCTV footage showing the murder of Kim Jong-nam was leaked to international media. 
“The question is how was the CCTV footage capturing Jong-nam’s murder leaked to foreign media and showcased in other countries like Japan and Singapore a few days later?” asked Salahuddin in a press conference at the party’s headquarters in Kuala Lumpur today. 
He expressed concern that the confidence of the international community in the country’s safety would decrease as a result of the leaked footage.
